about_the_game:
This pack includes:
• Purple Mutant Eaters Team & Arena – One of the toughest teams in the league with their eyes set on the Mayhem Bowl. Includes “Thunderdome” home arena.
• Hexxon Oilers Team & Arena – With Despawn Rotsom leading the offense and J.J. Rott on defense they are one of the league’s most exciting teams. Includes “AK-47” home stadium

This content requires the base game Mutant Football League in order to play.

content_descriptors.notes: Mutant Football League and its addons features violence, blood and gore (including exploding body parts, comically horrific deaths, and blood splatters) and some strong language.

detailed_description:
This pack includes:
• Purple Mutant Eaters Team & Arena – One of the toughest teams in the league with their eyes set on the Mayhem Bowl. Includes “Thunderdome” home arena.
• Hexxon Oilers Team & Arena – With Despawn Rotsom leading the offense and J.J. Rott on defense they are one of the league’s most exciting teams. Includes “AK-47” home stadium

This content requires the base game Mutant Football League in order to play.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2Quad 2.67 GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
